about_the_game:
In a world where living disasters have eradicated people’s homes, the protagonist sets out on a journey with Hounimal, the village guardian, to restore homes to the world.

Collect and Place Furniture


Obtain various pieces of furniture during your journey and place them in Hounimal. The actions you can choose in battle will change depending on the furniture. (Of course, you can also enjoy them as interior decorations!)

Simultaneous Turn-Based Command Battles


Command battles progress simultaneously with the enemy! Skillfully coordinate the protagonist and Hounimal, who randomly assist, to control the order of actions and gain an advantage in battle.

Rebuild Your Base

Listen to your companions' requests to unlock features that make your journey easier. Draw out more of Hounimal's power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: 『Hounimal』 is a roguelite command battle RPG where you journey with Hounimal, a reliable companion and your home. Place colorful and powerful furniture to build the best Hounimal!
